title: The Spiral Directive
outcome: Free zone councils discover Halden’s enigmatic spiral diagram. When applied to local BCI interfaces, secret protocols unlock stockpiled resources, shifting power dynamics. Some believe Halden engineered this as a safeguard for citizen self-rule, but divisions and chaos intensify as harmonist remnants trigger lockdowns attempting to control the unexpected unlocks.

events.description: A free zone assembly uncovers Halden’s spiral diagram embedded in old BCI configs. Applying it to local interfaces instantly unlocks previously inaccessible supply caches and data reserves.
Resource surpluses pour into several districts, fueling both celebration and suspicion as rumors swirl about Halden’s intentions in designing the spirals as a secret override.
Attempts by traditionalist Harmonists to use the spiral on their own trigger lockdowns and system errors, temporarily cutting off energy and communications across several sectors.
Free zone organizers formalize independent mutual-aid systems using the unlocked caches. Directorate officials denounce the unlocks as unlawful tampering as citywide power struggles escalate.
Strikes and protests erupt as both factions vie for control, divided between those celebrating the spiral as Halden’s final act of empowerment and those convinced it was a system sabotage.
